feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.2.7
entry.content: • 5cc86ad Fix color contrast on pause button in dark mode. Closes #337 by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.3.0
entry.content:
• c1763f9 add preset to history/queue by @arabcoders
  • 112da01 Major notification update to add initial support for apprise URLs. by @arabcoders
  • 95c2945 Allow the UI to bypass some checks for apprise URLs by @arabcoders
  • 395d01f Remove task ID from completion notification message by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.4.0
entry.content:
• 49ac272 auto focus the confirm button in confirm dialog. by @arabcoders
  • caf6033 minor improvements to the bg worker by @arabcoders
  • 1580388 renamed types folder by @arabcoders
  • 84f623f Convert socketStore and stateStore to ts by @arabcoders
  • 09c5d77 Cleaning up the event dispatcher system. by @arabcoders
  • 138a497 only offload to bg worker when needed. by @arabcoders
  • 0f7f22b removed event type ERROR and migrated it's uses to LOG_ERROR by @arabcoders
  • a7e8d24 Completed the events system upgrade and expanded the notifications events with support for apprise. by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.5.0
entry.content:
• 94193b8 removed useless log statement. by @arabcoders
  • 472b8cb Fixes #344 by @arabcoders
  • ac2056f Fix text overflow, Closes #345 by @arabcoders
  • e07751c Minor messaging changes by @arabcoders
  • a58921d Showing Premiering right now instead on not live by @arabcoders
  • d0706dd Update yt-dlp to 2025.7.21 by @ArabCoders
  • bdbc2f5 migrate more code to ts by @arabcoders
  • 3f338db Added event for item in archive by @arabcoders
  • 78e09e0 update external dependencies by @arabcoders
  • ca4e3df Fix upgrading and installing pip packages by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.5.1
entry.content:
• 6f059c7 nuxt4 migration by @arabcoders
  • 4a01750 Fixed in browser match_str to closely match yt-dlp match_str by @arabcoders
  • c60c14d Fix playlist_autonumber. Closes #351 by @arabcoders
